title: The Papers: 'Burnham coup plot' and Tories vow to 'ditch ban on petrol cars'
subtitle: Labour Mayor Andy Burnham's ambition to return to Parliament and a Tory pledge to scrap a 2030 ban on petrol cars lead the papers.
full_text: Labour Mayor Andy Burnham's ambition to return to Parliament and a Tory pledge to scrap a 2030 ban on petrol cars lead the papers.
